name: Ultraclean mangareader.net
description: View mangareader.net without showing any interface at all. Now available: full screen tablet reading and clutter free desktop reading!
additional_info:
View the next page browse using the mouse or arrow keys.
On a tablet: tap the comic page. 
On a desktop: click the manga or use the left and right arrow keys.

(You must enable javascript in order to use the arrow keys)

Best for use with bookmarked comics. In firefox: remember which page you were reading by bookmarking with ctrl-d. View bookmarked pages with ctrl-b.
